mapper.insert:
insert into design_plan_render_scene
fail_cause, plan_code, plan_name, plan_source, house_id, living_id, residential_units_name, user_id, media_type, design_source_type, design_id, design_template_id, design_style_id, pic_id, model_id, model_3d_id, model_u3d_id, web_model_u3d_id, ios_model_u3d_id, ipad_model_u3d_id, pc_model_u3d_id, android_model_u3d_id, macBookpc_model_u3d_id, config_file_id, space_common_id, plan_desc, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, remark, share_total, is_open, is_change, is_decorated, draft_state, baiMo_state, stuff_finish_state, decorate_finish_state, cover_pic_id, is_release, release_time, design_recommended_style_id, is_recommended, is_default_decorate, plan_number, scene_modified, design_plan_id, spelling_flower_file_id, spelling_flower_product, platform_id, waterjet_info, render_type, apply_space_areas, group_primary_id,
#{failCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{livingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{residentialUnitsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mediaType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{designSourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{designId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{designTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{designStyleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{model3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelU3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{webModelU3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iosModelU3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ipadModelU3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pcModelU3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{androidModelU3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{macBookpcModelU3dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{configFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spaceCommonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shareTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDecorated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{draftState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baiMoState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuffFinishState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{decorateFinishState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coverPicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isRelease,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{designRecommendedStyleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isRecommended,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDefaultDecorate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sceneModified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{designPlanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spellingFlowerFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spellingFlowerProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{waterjetInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applySpaceAreas,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupPrimaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: select id, scene_modified sceneModified from design_plan_render_scene where is_deleted =0 AND design_plan_id=#{designPlanId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: UPDATE design_plan_render_scene SET is_deleted = 1,gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from design_plan_product_render_scene as a LEFT JOIN base_product as b on(a.product_id=b.id) where a.plan_id =#{designPlanId} and a.is_deleted=0 and b.product_code like 'baimo%'

SELECT distinct(rs.id), rs.check_user_name, rs.fail_cause, rs.is_recommended, rs.is_default_decorate, rs.plan_number, rs.design_recommended_style_id, rs.release_time, rs.cover_pic_id, rs.plan_code, rs.plan_name, rs.plan_source, rs.house_id, rs.living_id, rs.residential_units_name, rs.user_id, rs.media_type, rs.design_source_type, rs.design_id, rs.share_total, rs.is_open, rs.is_change, rs.is_decorated, rs.draft_state, rs.baiMo_state, rs.stuff_finish_state, rs.decorate_finish_state, rs.design_template_id, rs.design_style_id, rs.pic_id, rs.model_id, rs.model_3d_id, rs.model_u3d_id, rs.web_model_u3d_id, rs.ios_model_u3d_id, rs.ipad_model_u3d_id, rs.pc_model_u3d_id, rs.android_model_u3d_id, rs.macBookpc_model_u3d_id, rs.config_file_id, rs.space_common_id, rs.plan_desc, rs.sys_code, rs.creator, rs.gmt_create, rs.modifier, rs.gmt_modified, rs.is_deleted, rs.remark, rs.evening_file_id, rs.dawn_file_id, rs.night_file_id, rs.effects_config, rs.design_plan_id, rs.scene_modified, rs.platform_id, sc.space_code,
dprCommon.id as dpr_common_id, dprCapacity.id as dpr_capacity_id,
dprCommon.is_release as dpr_is_release_o, dprCapacity.is_release as dpr_is_release_t,
rs.render_type, rs.group_primary_id FROM design_plan_render_scene AS rs LEFT JOIN res_render_pic AS rrp ON (rrp.design_scene_id = rs.id) LEFT JOIN space_common sc ON sc.id = rs.space_common_id
LEFT JOIN design_plan_recommended dprCommon ON dprCommon.plan_id = rs.id AND dprCommon.is_release in (1,2,3,4) AND dprCommon.is_deleted = 0 AND dprCommon.recommended_type = 1
AND (dprCommon.company_id = #{dprCompanyId,jdbcType = INTEGER} or dprCommon.company_id = 0)
LEFT JOIN design_plan_recommended dprCapacity on dprCapacity.plan_id = rs.id AND dprCapacity.is_release in (1,2,3,4) AND dprCapacity.is_deleted = 0 AND dprCapacity.recommended_type = 2
AND (dprCapacity.company_id = #{dprCompanyId,jdbcType = INTEGER} or dprCapacity.company_id =0)
WHERE rrp.is_deleted = 0 and rs.is_deleted = 0 AND rrp.id IS NOT NULL AND rrp.design_scene_id is not null AND (rrp.file_key = 'design.designPlan.render.small.pic' or rrp.file_key = 'design.designPlan.render.video.cover' ) and rs.platform_id in (select id from base_platform where platform_bussiness_type =#{platformBussinessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND rs.user_id = #{userId} AND sc.space_areas = #{spaceAreas} AND sc.space_function_id = #{spaceFunctionId} AND rs.plan_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND rs.render_type = #{renderType}
AND rs.group_primary_id = rs.id
AND rs.group_primary_id = 0
AND (rs.group_primary_id = 0 OR rs.group_primary_id = rs.id)
AND dprCommon.is_release = #{isReleaseR}
AND dprCapacity.is_release = #{isReleaseR}
group by rs.id
order by rs.id desc
LIMIT #{start}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rs.id) FROM design_plan_render_scene AS rs LEFT JOIN res_render_pic AS rrp ON (rrp.design_scene_id = rs.id) LEFT JOIN space_common sc ON sc.id = rs.space_common_id
LEFT JOIN design_plan_recommended dprCommon ON dprCommon.plan_id = rs.id AND dprCommon.is_release in (1,2,3,4) AND dprCommon.is_deleted = 0 AND dprCommon.recommended_type = 1
AND (dprCommon.company_id = #{dprCompanyId,jdbcType = INTEGER} or dprCommon.company_id = 0)
LEFT JOIN design_plan_recommended dprCapacity on dprCapacity.plan_id = rs.id AND dprCapacity.is_release in (1,2,3,4) AND dprCapacity.is_deleted = 0 AND dprCapacity.recommended_type = 2
AND (dprCapacity.company_id = #{dprCompanyId,jdbcType = INTEGER} or dprCapacity.company_id = 0)
WHERE rrp.is_deleted = 0 and rs.is_deleted = 0 AND rrp.id IS NOT NULL AND rrp.design_scene_id is not null AND (rrp.file_key = 'design.designPlan.render.small.pic' or rrp.file_key = 'design.designPlan.render.video.cover' ) and rs.platform_id in (select id from base_platform where platform_bussiness_type =#{platformBussinessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND rs.user_id = #{userId} AND sc.space_areas = #{spaceAreas} AND sc.space_function_id = #{spaceFunctionId} AND rs.plan_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND rs.render_type = #{renderType}
AND rs.group_primary_id = rs.id
AND rs.group_primary_id = 0
AND (rs.group_primary_id = 0 OR rs.group_primary_id = rs.id)
AND dprCommon.is_release = #{isReleaseR}
AND dprCapacity.is_release = #{isReleaseR}

SELECT DISTINCT sc.space_function_id FROM design_plan_render_scene dprs LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, space_function_id, space_areas FROM space_common WHERE is_deleted = 0 ) AS sc ON ( sc.id = dprs.space_common_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM sys_dictionary WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND type = 'houseType' ) AS sd ON ( sc.space_function_id = sd.VALUE ) WHERE dprs.id IN
${item}
mapper.update: UPDATE design_plan_render_scene SET group_primary_id = 0, modifier = #{name}, gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE group_primary_id = ${id}
